languages.text: "Доложи обо всем, что мы видели, Мастеру дисциплины. Пусть обыщет палаты плазмадвигателя и найдет мне мутантов и этого старика".
"Inform the Master-at-Arms of everything we saw. Let her search the plasma drive chambers and find the mutants and the old man for me."
languages.original_text: "Доложи обо всем, что мы видели, Мастеру дисциплины. Пусть обыщет палаты плазмадвигателя и найдет мне мутантов и этого старика".

traits.locale_text: "Inform the Master-at-Arms of everything we saw. Let her search the plasma drive chambers and find the mutants and the old man for me."
"Inform the Master-at-Arms of everything you saw. Let her search the plasma drive chambers and find the mutants and the old man for me."
"Inform the Master-at-Arms of everything you saw. Let her search the plasma drive chambers and find the mutants and the old man for me."
"Inform the Master-at-Arms of everything you saw. Let her search the plasma drive chambers and find the mutants and the old man for me."
"Inform the Master-at-Arms of everything we saw. Let her search the plasma drive chambers and find the mutants and the old man for me."
"Inform the Master-at-Arms of everything we saw. Let her search the plasma drive chambers and find the mutants and the old man for me."
"Inform the Master-at-Arms of everything we saw. Let her search the plasma drive chambers and find the mutants and the old man for me."

languages.text: «Informe a la maestra de armas de todo lo que hemos visto. Permítale registrar las cámaras del motor de plasma y encontrar a los mutantes y al anciano».
languages.original_text: "Inform the Master-at-Arms of everything we saw. Let her search the plasma drive chambers and find the mutants and the old man for me."

traits.locale_text: «Informe a la maestra de armas de todo lo que ha visto. Permítale registrar las cámaras del motor de plasma y encontrar a los mutantes y al anciano».

languages.text: 「我々が見たことを全て、マスター・アット・アームズに報告しろ。彼女にプラズマドライブ室の捜索させ、変異体と老人を発見させろ」
languages.original_text: "Inform the Master-at-Arms of everything we saw. Let her search the plasma drive chambers and find the mutants and the old man for me."

traits.locale_text: 「見たことを全て、マスター・アット・アームズに報告しろ。彼女にプラズマドライブ室の捜索、そして変異体と老人の発見を任せる」

languages.text: “把我们看到的一切都告诉戒律大师，让她搜查等离子驱动室，把那群变种人和那个老家伙给我揪出来。”
languages.original_text: "Inform the Master-at-Arms of everything we saw. Let her search the plasma drive chambers and find the mutants and the old man for me."

traits.locale_text: “把你看到的一切都告诉戒律大师，让她搜查等离子驱动室，把那群变种人和那个老人给我揪出来。”

languages.text: "Berichtet der Master-at-Arms, was wir gesehen habe. Alles. Sie soll für mich die Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern durchsuchen und die Mutanten und den alten Mann finden."
languages.original_text: "Inform the Master-at-Arms of everything we saw. Let her search the plasma drive chambers and find the mutants and the old man for me."

traits.locale_text: "Berichtet der Master-at-Arms, was Ihr gesehen habt. Alles. Sie soll für mich die Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern durchsuchen und die Mutanten und den alten Mann finden."

languages.text: « Transmettez toutes nos observations à la capitaine d'armes. Qu'elle fouille la salle des réacteurs à plasma à la recherche des mutants et du vieil homme. »
languages.original_text: "Inform the Master-at-Arms of everything we saw. Let her search the plasma drive chambers and find the mutants and the old man for me."

traits.locale_text: « Transmettez toutes vos observations à la capitaine d'armes. Qu'elle fouille la salle des réacteurs à plasma à la recherche des mutants et du vieil homme. »

languages.text: "Silahtar'ı gördüğümüz her şeyden haberdar et. Plazma iticisi odalarını araştırıp mutantları ve ihtiyar adamı bulsun."
languages.original_text: "Inform the Master-at-Arms of everything we saw. Let her search the plasma drive chambers and find the mutants and the old man for me."
